venue.name: Villa Victoria's Jorge Hernandez Cultural Center

item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans

We have two special occasion to come out and dance the night away.  Our favorite band Ritmo Masacote is having a CD Release Party at Club Cubano's.  Ana will also be there celebrating her birthday.  For those of you that do not know her yet I will be more than happy to introduce you to her.  There is also a "3 Drink Masacote Special" going on at the bar for us drinkers to have a few rounds.

 

I wanted to inform everyone that there is a FREE Concert in City Hall before the release party.  Feel free to check it out and then join us for a great night at Club Cubanos.

 

Here are the details.

 

Ritmo Masacote ( LIVE MUSIC)   
      

  SPECIAL SINGLE RELEASE! AND

Ana Masacote Bday Celebration!!!

 

 

 



Guest DJ: DJ Asho from Washington, DC!

8:00-8:45pm Beginner & Intermediate NY Style Salsa On 2 Classes with Masacote

9:00-9:45pm Cuban Casino Rueda Classes ALL LEVELS On 1 with Amanda Gill

10:00-2:00am Dancing and Party Time!

  **Don't Forget about the 3 Drink Masacote Specials**

$15 Cover ( Credit & Cash Accepted at the Door)

-Includes boths lessons and concert

-The cd will be on sale for only $3 for the night .

 

For more information on the Band please Visit:   

http://www.facebook.com/#!/ritmomasacote

 

For more information on the location please Visit:   

  http://www.cubanosboston.com/index.html

﻿

See you there !!!

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a black Fedora Hat !!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: New Single CD Release Event for Ritmo Masacote at Club Cubanos !!!
